title: Isolations of geodesic planes in the frame bundle of a hyperbolic $3$-manifold. (arXiv:2002.06579v3 [math.DS] UPDATED)
description: We present a quantitative isolation property of the lifts of properly immersed geodesic planes in the frame bundle of a geometrically finite hyperbolic $3$-manifold. Our estimates are polynomials in the tight areas and Bowen-Margulis-Sullivan densities of geodesic planes, with degree given by the modified critical exponents.
dc:creator: Amir Mohammadi, Hee Oh
